jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Email your Resume to jobs@vedenterprise.com

iOS Developer

iOS Developer will join an experienced team. Details of the Job The candidate will be part of a cross-functional team supporting the mobile product. Individual will be supporting development and implementation of client-specific applications, and designing and implementing new features as part of the overall product roadmap. They will unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability. The candidate will also collaborate on bug-fixing and improve application performance. In addition, the candidate should continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

Specific Skills Ideal candidate for the iOS Developer position will:
• Be experienced and comfortable working in a B2B environment.
• Have experience working with large amounts of complex data on the application development side. Big data is meant to be big!
• Have a strong foundation in objective oriented concepts.
• Possess sound understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.
• Be comfortable on Objective-C and iOS SDK.
• Be familiar with publishing apps and/or deploying apps in enterprise.
• Ideally have experience publishing applications in the marketplace (App Store, etc).

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: iOS Developer will join an experienced team
In addition, the candidate should continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
Specific Skills Ideal candidate for the iOS Developer position will:
Be experienced and comfortable working in a B2B environment
Have experience working with large amounts of complex data on the application development side
Big data is meant to be big!
Have a strong foundation in objective oriented concepts
Possess sound understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
Be comfortable on Objective-C and iOS SDK
Be familiar with publishing apps and/or deploying apps in enterprise
Ideally have experience publishing applications in the marketplace (App Store, etc)

jobs_results.title: Sr IOS Developer - Remote within USA | Multiple positions
jobs_results.description:
Role: Sr IOS Developer

Positions: Multiple Positions

Location: Remote within USA ( Prefer in PST timezone)

Visa: USC/GC/EAD
• 7-9 years of expereince in IOS app development
• Solid understanding of the iOS SDK, UIKit, GCD, and Auto Layout
• Proficiency in Swift and experience with SwiftUI
• Strong background in unit testing and memory management
• Comfortable with Git and version control best practices
• Deep understanding of the native mobile app ecosystem
• Passion for creating user-centric applications with elegant and intuitive interfaces
• Familiarity with functional or reactive programming frameworks like RxSwift or Combine is a plus

items: Location: Remote within USA ( Prefer in PST timezone)

Solid understanding of the iOS SDK, UIKit, GCD, and Auto Layout
Proficiency in Swift and experience with SwiftUI
Strong background in unit testing and memory management
Comfortable with Git and version control best practices

Passion for creating user-centric applications with elegant and intuitive interfaces

jobs_results.title: IOS Developer with Material design
jobs_results.description:
Mandatory Skills/Qualifications:
• For iOS - This role requires familiarity with both Swift and Objective-C, as our code base uses both languages. Most critically, you will need to have a solid understanding of UIKit and iOS platform norms in order to resolve many issues. You should have existing familiarity with UIKit's best practices and norms.
• Migrations of Material iOS libraries in Google3
• Incrementally migrate Google applications from deprecated technology stacks to use the latest Material infrastructure and components as recommended.

.

Job Type: Contract

Pay: $25.00 per hour

Benefits:
• Dental insurance

Schedule:
• 8 hour shift

Work Location: On the road

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: For iOS - This role requires familiarity with both Swift and Objective-C, as our code base uses both languages
Most critically, you will need to have a solid understanding of UIKit and iOS platform norms in order to resolve many issues
You should have existing familiarity with UIKit's best practices and norms
Migrations of Material iOS libraries in Google3
Incrementally migrate Google applications from deprecated technology stacks to use the latest Material infrastructure and components as recommended

Dental insurance
8 hour shift

jobs_results.title: Sr iOS Developer :: No H1B, CPT and OPT Please
jobs_results.description:
SR iOS Contractor

This will be an On-Site position in Houston M-F

Interview Process

Initial phone screen

Assessment test via Teams

Final Interview On-Site Houston

Sr iOS Developer

We need a candidate who can go onsite 5 days a week. This position is for a lead developer who is also familiar with Android if possible.

The work is currently based on SWIFTUI with latest version of iOS. This Client does not use any of the older iOS UI like UI Kit.

(On-Site) Duration 12-24 months

Requirements: 7+ years of experience

Experience with SwiftUI Experience with CoreData.

Experience With Swift Package Manager Preferred.

Previous leadership experience Preferred mentoring jr. developers

Must be open to work within Oil & Gas Industry

If you are interested or have any references please share resume at mukul@brightmindsol.com.

items: We need a candidate who can go onsite 5 days a week
This position is for a lead developer who is also familiar with Android if possible

This Client does not use any of the older iOS UI like UI Kit
(On-Site) Duration 12-24 months

jobs_results.title: IOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Adidev Technologies Inc

www.adidevtechnologies.com

URGENT NEED FOR IOS DEVELOPERS! - HIRING PROCESS ONLY 24-48 HOURS!

Adidev Technologies is looking for entry-level and mid-level iOS developers with ½ year - to 3 years of experience. Must be open to relocation and working onsite following the lifting of Covid-19 restrictions (if requested by the client). Must be a driven self-starter. Salary will vary depending on experience and we are seeking candidates that are looking to start as soon as possible. Must have excellent written and oral communication, as well as the desire and ability to work well in a team environment.

If you are looking for a new challenge and are ready to make an impact on a growing team, then this will be a perfect fit for you. As an iOS developer for Adidev Technologies, you will be optimizing, building, and troubleshooting large-scale applications for our globally-recognized enterprise-level clients.

We are a software consulting company that is rapidly growing and expanding and have established ourselves as a go-to resource to our highly-visible clients, we remain ready to take on new partnerships, and to do so we are in search of brilliant Android developers to join our team to make it possible. Not only do we offer a great team and support structure, but we also offer you the opportunity to make an immediate impact and grow your skillset at the same time.

Responsibilities and Duties:

Design and build applications for the iOS platform
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
Maintain positive rapport with all clients
Ability to gather requirements and provide accurate and realistic project milestones and timelines for completion
Maintain open communication via phone, text, and email on a daily basis
Complete daily project progress summaries
Suggest new features and expansions of existing apps improve performance and usability

Deliver on time and clearly communicate any changes in deadlines as soon as possible

Qualifications and Skills:

Hands-on experience in Swift, Unit test automation, Agile, GitHub, and Objective-C.
Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc.
Experience with Design Patterns such as MVC, MVVM, etc.
Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
Familiarity with 3rd Party API integrations such as Facebook, Dropbox, Instagram, Twitter, GoogleDrive, Bluetooth, Keychain, etc.
Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards
Understanding of Apple’s design principles and interface guidelines
Experience with performance and memory tuning with tools
Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
An understanding of iOS design patterns/coding conventions, Apple’s Human Interface Guidelines, and App Store Review Guidelines
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools {{such as Git, Mercurial, or SVN}}
Familiarity with continuous integration

Required experience:

Ability to write efficient, reusable, and maintainable code in SwiftBasic understanding of Objective C
Design and build advanced applications for the IOS platform
Experience in design, development, and coding (iPhone,iPad)
Excellent expertise in iOS SDK frameworks and fundamentals
Must have managed at least one application live on App Store.

Good to have:

Hands-on experience with React Native is a plus
A GitHub account with some creative projects
Knowledge of any Server side language is a plus. HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript experience, a plus.
Knowledge of Swift UI

What we offer:

Competitive Salary
Paid Relocation (when applicable)
Remote Support
Guaranteed Regular Salary Reviews
Job Type: W2 or Contract 1099 (full time - 40 hours)
Salary: $60k to $90k or $30/hr to $45/hr (Commensurate with experience)

jobs_results.title: IOS Developer (RxSwift or ReactiveCocoa)
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Elite Workforce is led by professionals with extensive industry
experience in IT and Consulting. Elite Workforce wishes to engage with
clients in the global market place as a trusted advisor and partner.

Our motto is to become an international professional services entity of
highest standards and help our clients and communities we work with to
grow and evolve using best practices and solutions thus building
sustainable, cleaner, safer and more prosperous world.

Job Description

Position: IOS Developer
Location: Atlanta, GA / Dallaz, TX
Employment: Fulltime / Permanent / Direct Hire
Visa: Authorized to work on W2 - NO Corp to Corp

Client is expecting RxSwift or ReactiveCocoa framework
experience along with regular iOS experience. We may not be able to
propose these resources if they don't have these specific skillset.

Qualifications

Required Skills:
• Have at least 3 years of experience on iOS app development
• Experience with iOS, Swift, Objective C and Cocoa Touch
• 3+ years experience in mobile application development
• Experience in UI designing with auto layout, storyboards and size classes.
• Fundamentals in object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm design, problem solving, and complexity analysis
• Good Knowledge of Swift programming concepts
• Knowledge of Swift Protocol Oriented Programming is preferable
• Deep knowledge on iOS multithreading programming is necessary
• Exceptional analytical aptitude and attention to detail
• Good knowledge of Ecommerce Technology and Architecture
• Have basic understanding of UML, XML, Web Services
• Deep understanding of iOS WebKit and Cookie handling
• ExperiencewithdevelopingAugmentedRealityapplications
• Good knowledge on framework integration and dependency management tools like Cocoa Pod/ Carthage etc.
• ExperiencewithOpenGL
• ExperienceindevelopingLocationbasedservices including Map Kit
• Good Experience in various XCode debugging tools , especially Instrument tools
• Good Knowledge on Xcode Unit Testing and UI testing practices
• Understanding of Source Code Control (Preferred - GIT) and maintenance
• Experience in calling REST API with XML and JSON Reponses
• Experience in continuous integration practices (Tools like Jenkins) is preferable
• Good knowledge on Apple's new features and updates on iOS and other relevant technologies
• Good Knowledge on various design patterns like MVC, MVP, MVVM etc.

Additional Information

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Engineer
jobs_results.description: We are seeking a Senior iOS Engineer for our growing team. With Vaporstream, you'll have the chance to make a big difference on a team working together to build and enhance our secure messaging app. The iOS team is currently working to build new features while maintaining a continuous delivery to production. We pride ourselves in creating the best possible user experience experience while using the best tools for the job. In this role, you will work in an Agile team that handles specs driven by both internal needs as well as customer requests to build new features and improve existing functionality of the iOS mobile app. All of our team works remotely, and this is a remote (work from home) position. What We Are Looking For 4+ Years experience developing apps using Xcode and the iOS SDK Experience with Swift and Objective-C Expert knowledge of iOS, as well as common architectural patterns of the platform. Experienced in the use of RESTful Web-Services, websocket communication, JSON, networking protocols and best practices for promoting leading application performance Experience using SQLite databases Experience signing and deploying iOS applications to the App Store Experience with MVC and MVVM architecture in Cocoa applications Experience working in cross-functional teams. Powered by JazzHR

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: What We Are Looking For 4+ Years experience developing apps using Xcode and the iOS SDK Experience with Swift and Objective-C Expert knowledge of iOS, as well as common architectural patterns of the platform

Experienced in the use of RESTful Web-Services, websocket communication, JSON, networking protocols and best practices for promoting leading application performance Experience using SQLite databases Experience signing and deploying iOS applications to the App Store Experience with MVC and MVVM architecture in Cocoa applications Experience working in cross-functional teams

job_highlights.title: Benefits
items: All of our team works remotely, and this is a remote (work from home) position

job_highlights.title: Responsibilities
items: With Vaporstream, you'll have the chance to make a big difference on a team working together to build and enhance our secure messaging app

In this role, you will work in an Agile team that handles specs driven by both internal needs as well as customer requests to build new features and improve existing functionality of the iOS mobile app

jobs_results.title: IoS Developer
jobs_results.description:
As a mobile developer, you will be part of a tight knit team, coding with a purpose. You will work in an engineering and product centric culture, using the best and latest technologies in a board development framework (iOS, Android). You will also get hands on experience with massive scale, cutting edge frameworks, cross platform design and responsiveness, and world-class UI and UX design. If you are a strong Native Mobile Developer (iOS/Android) with consumer applications experience, please apply immediately for this amazing opportunity.

Responsibilities
• Develop and extend the reach of our highly-rated existing applications, while helping to define, re- invent the roadmap for future apps.
• Create elegant code that is efficient, reusable, and easy to maintain.
• Break frontiers in performance and accessibility, and bring a whole new industry to mobile.
• Create interfaces and APIs that will connect with a third party vendors.Collaborate with other engineering resources, product, and design teams to innovate and create a novel mobile experience for retail shopping customers.

Desired Skills and Experience
• 2+ years of experience developing mobile apps (iOS and/or Android).
• Deep understanding of web services architecture and SOAP/REST interfaces and knowledge of UI frameworks (Android, iOS, SML), application design, and complex, reactive touch-based UIs.
• Noteworthy skills in HTML5, CSS3 and Advanced Javascript.
• Hands on experience on designing and implementing iOS apps and and Native Mobile apps.
• Experience working on Objective-C, XCode, UIKit and Interface Builder.
• Experience working on Object Oriented Analysis and Design (OOAD).
• Experience working on performance tuning the high scalable apps.
• Experience working on integrating RESTful webservices.
• Experience with NodeJS, Grunt and PhoneGap etc mobile frameworks.Full stack development experience is added advantage.

Educational Qualification:
• BS / MS in Computer Science from a reputed school / program (or equivalent)

Please Submit your Resume to hiring manager skedari@hanuinnotech.com or hr@hanuinnotech.com

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: You will also get hands on experience with massive scale, cutting edge frameworks, cross platform design and responsiveness, and world-class UI and UX design
Full stack development experience is added advantage
BS / MS in Computer Science from a reputed school / program (or equivalent)

jobs_results.title: Sr. iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and test native iOS applications for Apple devices
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
• Write clean and efficient code, following best practices and design patterns
• Ensure the quality, performance, and reliability of applications
• Work on bug fixing and improving application performance
• Continuously Client, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
• Stay up-to-date with the latest iOS SDK and technologies

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
• 8 years of experience developing iOS applications
• Strong understanding of the iOS SDK and frameworks
• Experience with Objective-C or Swift
• Experience with unit testing and test-driven development
• Experience with continuous integration and continuous delivery
• Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with cloud computing platforms such as AWS or Azure
• Experience with machine learning and artificial intelligence
• Experience with user experience design
• Experience with open source development

8 years of experience developing iOS applications
Strong understanding of the iOS SDK and frameworks
Experience with Objective-C or Swift
Experience with unit testing and test-driven development
Experience with continuous integration and continuous delivery
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
